auth.privacyPolicyContent:
Privacy Policy

At Cyprigo, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

Information We Collect
â€¢ Account Information: Name, email address, and profile photo
â€¢ Location Data: To show nearby tourist attractions (with your permission)
â€¢ Usage Data: In-app interactions and preferences
â€¢ Device Information: For performance improvement

How We Use Information
â€¢ Provide information about tourist places in Northern Cyprus
â€¢ Offer personalized recommendations
â€¢ Manage and secure your account
â€¢ Improve app performance

Data Security
We use SSL/TLS encryption and secure server infrastructure.

Your Rights
You have the right to access, correct, and delete your data. You can delete your account from Settings > Delete My Account.

Contact
cyprurigo@gmail.com

Last updated: December 2024
auth.termsOfServiceContent:
Terms of Service

By using Cyprigo, you agree to the following terms.

Service Description
Cyprigo is an informational app that helps you discover tourist attractions and tours in Northern Cyprus. We do not process direct reservations or payments.

User Account
â€¢ You must provide accurate and current information
â€¢ You are responsible for your account security
â€¢ You can delete your account at any time

In-App Purchases
â€¢ All purchases are processed through Apple App Store
â€¢ Subscriptions auto-renew
â€¢ To cancel, use iOS Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions

User Responsibilities
â€¢ Use the app for lawful purposes only
â€¢ Respect other users
â€¢ Do not share harmful or inappropriate content

Intellectual Property
App content and design belong to Cyprigo.

Contact
cyprurigo@gmail.com

Last updated: December 2024

tours.question: How can I discover tours?
tours.answer: You can discover all tours in North Cyprus using the categories on the home page or the search feature. You can also see nearby tours on the map view.

favorites.question: How do I add to favorites?
favorites.answer: Tap the heart icon on a tour detail page to add it to your favorites. You can access your favorites from the bottom menu.

directions.question: How do I get to a tour location?
directions.answer: Tap the "Get Directions" button on the tour detail page to get directions via your map app.

membership.question: What are the membership benefits?
membership.answer: With Gold and Business memberships, you can enjoy exclusive discounts, early access, and VIP tours.

faq.a1: You can discover all tours in North Cyprus using the categories on the home page or the search feature. You can also see nearby tours on the map view.
faq.q2: How can I upgrade my membership?
faq.a2: Go to your profile and open the "Membership Card" section to explore Gold or Business membership options.
faq.q3: How do I add tours to favorites?
faq.a3: Tap the heart icon on a tour detail page to add it to favorites. Access favorites from the bottom tab.
faq.a4: You can manage your notification preferences from the Settings page. Stay informed about new tours and recommendations.
faq.q5: How can I delete my account?
faq.a5: Reach our support team from the Contact page. Account deletion removes all data permanently.
faq.q6: How do I get to a tour location?
faq.a6: Tap the "Get Directions" button on the tour detail page to get directions via your map app.

welcome.title: Discover North Cyprus
welcome.subtitle:
Explore unique beauties,
create unforgettable memories

1.title: Create Your Route
1.description: Discover the most beautiful places, design your ideal route and enjoy a seamless travel experience.

2.title: Start Exploring
2.description: Ancient castles, pristine beaches and breathtaking views. Discover the treasures of North Cyprus.

3.title: Get More Done Together
3.description: Create personalized routes, save your favorites and share unforgettable memories with other travelers.
